title: Ace Digital Product Passport (W3C + ESPR Aligned v2.0)
description: Enhanced W3C JSON-LD schema for Ace Digital Product Passport — fully compliant with ESPR Articles 4-12, W3C VC Data Model 2.0, and future EU DPP Registry.

@context.description: JSON-LD context defining semantic vocabulary mappings

@id.description: Unique identifier for this DPP instance

identification.description: Unique identity and traceability info as per ESPR Article 9.

uniqueProductIdentifier.description: Globally unique identifier (GTIN, UUID, or custom scheme)

dataCarrierType.description: Type of machine-readable data carrier per ESPR Article 9

manufacturerIdentifier.description: EORI, VAT, or other official registration number

product.description: Product characteristics, images, and technical specifications (ESPR core Articles 5–7).

energyEfficiencyClass.description: EU Energy Label class (A+++ to G)

economicOperators.description: Chain of economic operators per ESPR Article 4.

identifier.description: EORI, VAT, DUNS, or other official ID

sustainability.description: Environmental and circularity metrics — Articles 5–7 ESPR.

substancesOfConcern.description: REACH SVHC and other hazardous substances

recycledContentPercent.description: Percentage of recycled materials by weight

carbonFootprint.description: Total carbon footprint in kg CO2e

pefCompliant.description: Compliant with EU Product Environmental Footprint

lifecycle.description: Maintenance, service, and traceability records (ESPR Articles 7 & 10).

recyclabilityRate.description: Percentage of product that can be recycled

metadata.description: Access rights, registry info, and resolver (Article 10 ESPR).

resolverUrl.description: URL to resolve DPP identifier to current location

registryEntryId.description: ID in EU DPP Registry (when available)

euDppRegistryUrl.description: Link to EU DPP Registry entry

storageLocation.description: Where the DPP data is hosted

regulatorAccessFields.description: Fields only for market surveillance authorities

availabilityGuarantee.description: Minimum availability period per ESPR Article 10
